alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 5:28PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Alachua, northern Marion and west central Putnam Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 527 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Orange Springs, or 8 miles southwest of Interlachen. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds gusts near 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hawthorne, Orange Springs, Cross Creek, Lochloosa, Johnson and Grove Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Western Putnam
